description:
Reversible and warm, this jacket gives 2 different style choices for youngsters to match their mood. Down throughout the body focuses warmth where it's needed most, and elastic cuff and hood bindings ensure gusts won't sneak in. Should the snow start falling, synthetic insulation in the hood holds it's warm even if it gets damp.

  • Lightweight recycled polyester shell has a DWR finish that sheds light rain and wind with ease
  • Reversible design gives you 2 different looks, and is a nice option in the case of cocoa mishaps
  • Insulated with high-loft premium 600-fill power recycled down seals in body heat
  • Horizontal quilting keeps down evenly distributed
  • Heatseeker Eco synthetic insulation in hood is light, efficient and composed of 70% post-consumer recycled material
  • Elasticised piping at the cuffs, hem and hood keep the cozy in and brrr out
  • Hand pockets on the outside keep hands warm and small necessities close
name: The North Face Printed Reversible North Down Hooded Jacket - Boys' - Children to Youths

value: 600 fill-power recycled goose and duck down blend
